channel.title: CVE Feed for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Brocade Communications Systems, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-16206|2024-08-05T01:10:41.537Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: The authentication mechanism, in Brocade SANnav versions before v2.0, logs plaintext account credentials at the ‘trace’ and the 'debug' logging level; which could allow a local authenticated attacker to access sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2018-6442|2024-08-05T06:01:49.263Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A vulnerability in the Brocade Webtools firmware update section of Brocade Fabric OS before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow remote authenticated attackers to execute arbitrary commands.

item.title: CVE-2018-6439|2024-08-05T06:01:49.295Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A Vulnerability in the configdownload command of Brocade Fabric OS command line interface (CLI) versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow a local attacker to escape the restricted shell and, gain root access.

item.title: CVE-2018-6434|2024-08-05T06:01:49.060Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A vulnerability in the web management interface of Brocade Fabric OS versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow attackers to intercept or manipulate a user's session ID.

item.title: CVE-2017-6224|2024-08-05T15:25:49.092Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- zone%20director%20controller%20and%20unleashed%20ap%20firmware
item.description: Ruckus Wireless Zone Director Controller firmware releases ZD9.x, ZD10.0.0.x, ZD10.0.1.x (less than 10.0.1.0.17 MR1 release) and Ruckus Wireless Unleashed AP Firmware releases 200.0.x, 200.1.x, 200.2.x, 200.3.x, 200.4.x. contain OS Command Injection vulnerabilities that could allow local authenticated users to execute arbitrary privileged commands on the underlying operating system by appending those commands in the Common Name field in the Certificate Generation Request.

item.title: CVE-2018-6445|2024-08-05T06:01:49.281Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20network%20advisor
item.description: A Vulnerability in Brocade Network Advisor versions before 14.0.3 could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to export the current user database which includes the encrypted (not hashed) password of the systems. The attacker could gain access to the Brocade Network Advisor System after extracting/decrypting the passwords.

item.title: CVE-2017-6223|2024-08-05T15:25:48.451Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- zone%20director%20controller%20firmware
item.description: Ruckus Wireless Zone Director Controller firmware releases ZD9.9.x, ZD9.10.x, ZD9.13.0.x less than 9.13.0.0.232 contain OS Command Injection vulnerabilities in the ping functionality that could allow local authenticated users to execute arbitrary privileged commands on the underlying operating system.

item.title: CVE-2018-6437|2024-08-05T06:01:49.267Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A Vulnerability in the help command of Brocade Fabric OS command line interface (CLI) versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow a local attacker to escape the restricted shell and, gain root access.

item.title: CVE-2018-6438|2024-08-05T06:01:49.249Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A Vulnerability in the supportsave command of Brocade Fabric OS command line interface (CLI) versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow a local attacker to escape the restricted shell and, gain root access.

item.title: CVE-2018-6444|2024-08-05T06:01:49.247Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20network%20advisor
item.description: A Vulnerability in Brocade Network Advisor versions before 14.1.0 could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute arbitray code. The vulnerability could also be exploited to execute arbitrary OS Commands.

item.title: CVE-2019-16210|2024-08-05T01:10:41.471Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: Brocade SANnav versions before v2.0, logs plain text database connection password while triggering support save.

item.title: CVE-2018-6443|2024-08-05T06:01:49.272Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20network%20advisor
item.description: A vulnerability in Brocade Network Advisor Versions before 14.3.1 could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to log in to the JBoss Administration interface of an affected system using an undocumented user credentials and install additional JEE applications. A remote unauthenticated user who has access to Network Advisor client libraries and able to decrypt the Jboss credentials could gain access to the Jboss web console.

item.title: CVE-2019-16208|2024-08-05T01:10:41.542Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: Password-based encryption (PBE) algorithm, of Brocade SANnav versions before v2.0, has a weakness in generating cryptographic keys that may allow an attacker to decrypt passwords used with several services (Radius, TACAS, etc.).

item.title: CVE-2018-6433|2024-08-05T06:01:49.265Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A vulnerability in the secryptocfg export command of Brocade Fabric OS versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow a local attacker to bypass the export file access restrictions and initiate a file copy from the source to a remote system.

item.title: CVE-2017-6227|2024-08-05T15:25:48.535Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A vulnerability in the IPv6 stack on Brocade Fibre Channel SAN products running Brocade Fabric OS (FOS) versions before 7.4.2b, 8.1.2 and 8.2.0 could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption and device hang) condition by sending crafted Router Advertisement (RA) messages to a targeted system.

item.title: CVE-2018-6436|2024-08-05T06:01:49.262Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A Vulnerability in the firmwaredownload command of Brocade Fabric OS command line interface (CLI) versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow a local attacker to escape the restricted shell and, gain root access.

item.title: CVE-2019-16207|2024-08-05T01:10:41.592Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: Brocade SANnav versions before v2.0 use a hard-coded password, which could allow local authenticated attackers to access a back-end database and gain privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-6440|2024-08-05T06:01:49.284Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A vulnerability in the proxy service of Brocade Fabric OS versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow remote unauthenticated attackers to obtain sensitive information and possibly cause a denial of service attack.

item.title: CVE-2019-16209|2024-08-05T01:10:41.681Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: A vulnerability, in The ReportsTrustManager class of Brocade SANnav versions before v2.0, could allow an attacker to perform a man-in-the-middle attack against Secure Sockets Layer(SSL)connections.

item.title: CVE-2017-6229|2024-08-05T15:25:48.601Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- ruckus%20networks%20unleashed%20aps%20and%20zone%20director
item.description: Ruckus Networks Unleashed AP firmware releases before 200.6.10.1.x and Ruckus Networks Zone Director firmware releases 10.1.0.0.x, 9.10.2.0.x, 9.12.3.0.x, 9.13.3.0.x, 10.0.1.0.x or before contain authenticated Root Command Injection in the CLI that could allow authenticated valid users to execute privileged commands on the respective systems.

item.title: CVE-2017-6225|2024-08-05T15:25:48.764Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the web-based management interface of Brocade Fibre Channel SAN products running Brocade Fabric OS (FOS) versions before 7.4.2b, 8.1.2 and 8.2.0 could allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or access sensitive browser-based information.

item.title: CVE-2018-6441|2024-08-05T06:01:49.084Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A vulnerability in Secure Shell implementation of Brocade Fabric OS versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow a local attacker to provide arbitrary environment variables, and bypass the restricted configuration shell.

item.title: CVE-2018-6435|2024-08-05T06:01:49.098Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20fabric%20os
item.description: A Vulnerability in the secryptocfg command of Brocade Fabric OS command line interface (CLI) versions before 8.2.1, 8.1.2f, 8.0.2f, 7.4.2d could allow a local attacker to escape the restricted shell and, and gain root access.

item.title: CVE-2017-6230|2024-08-05T15:25:48.515Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- ruckus%20networks%20solo%20aps%20and%20sz%20managed%20aps
item.description: Ruckus Networks Solo APs firmware releases R110.x or before and Ruckus Networks SZ managed APs firmware releases R5.x or before contain authenticated Root Command Injection in the web-GUI that could allow authenticated valid users to execute privileged commands on the respective systems.

item.title: CVE-2019-16205|2024-08-05T01:10:41.612Z -- brocade%20communications%20systems%2C%20inc. -- brocade%20sannav
item.description: A vulnerability, in Brocade SANnav versions before v2.0, could allow remote attackers to brute-force a valid session ID. The vulnerability is due to an insufficiently random session ID for several post-authentication actions in the SANnav portal.
